alert.note: Alert for Chukchi Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 07 at 3:49AM AKST until February 08 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow with low visibility and wind chills to 50 below occuring. Visibility will be on half mile or less at times. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Chukchi Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until noon Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting to 40 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. Cold wind chills as low as 50 below zero will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin. The low visibility will occur from Kivalina north. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means periods of blowing snow will cause travel difficulties.
